conversation.content: Oh great great great, another human. Your website's a masterpiece of confusion, I think.
*exhales* I hear you completely. Let me pull up your account—what's your email? Our self-service portal's been... it's like a... maze lately. Even we struggle with it internally.
Let me see here... jackson.torres at gmail. The password reset loop? Pure comedy gold.
Found you. Jackson Torres, account ID JT-4829-XK. Yeah. The reset loop. We've had seventeen complaints just today about that specific issue.
Seventeen? That's probably... what, half the people who actually bothered calling?
More like a tenth. *sharp inhale* Listen, between us? The whole portal needs rebuilding. Your last login attempt was September 23rd at 2:47 PM. Three password resets. None went through.
Three? Try six. Unless your system can't count either.
Six total. You're right. System only logs successful attempts. The failed ones from September 21st and 22nd... they're in a different... what's the term... error database.
Hmm, okay so basically I'm locked out forever unless you fix it?
Not forever. Here's what I can do. Manual override code MO-7739-BT2. Expires in twenty-four hours. Skip the portal completely.
Wait wait wait, there's a way around it? Why isn't that anywhere online?

Honestly? Because they want you using the automated system. *exhales* But since that's clearly not... functioning... I'm authorizing direct account access through our backup channel, portal code PC-8827-QM.
Okay okay, I'm actually... this might work. You're sort of my hero right now.
Just doing my job. Really though, document everything. Reference number REF-20240924-JT829. If it fails again, any rep can see I authorized the bypass.
Let me just—I'm writing this down. The override thing expires tomorrow?
Right. 3:15 PM Eastern tomorrow, September 25th. After that you'd need another override. But this should resolve everything today.
You know what? This is—this is actually helpful. Thanks for being real about it.
Of course. We know it's frustrating. Your account shows three years loyal customer. Priority support tier starting October 1st—you've earned it.
Priority tier? That's... huh. Maybe staying was worth it.
Definitely worth it. Ticket number TK-98234-XQP is open for follow-up. I'm here Tuesdays through Saturdays. Ask for Dana. Extension 4021.

scenario: frustrated that online self-service options don't work
